Egroups is screwing up, and not sending some of the messages to everyone. 
They are, however, recording every one, so it would probably be best for 
everyone to read the messages at http://egroups.com/messages/nbwrpg

::Ramulus/Prowl/Striker::

Ramulus jumps to his feet as Longhunter emerges from her pod. The poor ram 
was not used to these temperatures (cold). He was shivering.

"Hello," he says, "Welcome to earth. You're a maximal,right?"

His comm-link beeps, before playing back Figit's message of the Ark being 
attacked.

"We need to hurry back to base. We're under attack."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Prowl is thrown forward as a shot hits the back of his left knee, sending him 
flipping in the air (he was flying), but regaining his balance. He spins 
around, firing at Hades.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Striker takes out his missile launcher, firing a shot at Shuko.
